name: Posture Scale Analyzer
descr:
The Bilateral Scale Analyzer is based on a dual force plate with computer communication and a patient tracking and test analysis software program. The system provides a calculated feedback display and a printout for analysis and training. The system synchronizes with the computer and provides the following calculated (over time) data: total weight, weight distribution on each leg, right and left, weight and percentages difference between right and left legs, weight distribution on heels and toes, weight and percentages difference between heels and toes.

Specification: Max. load 200 kg.
